entry.title: Monday night: Chance of light snow. Low minus 14. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of light snow. Fog patches developing this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 14. Wind chill minus 15 this evening and minus 22 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Monday 16 January 2023
